information.description: A framework containing shared functionality and services used in all of my tweaks, also allowing communication between my tweaks for the best experience.

changelog.changes: - Fix bundle image path for rootless

- Improvements to Ecosystem and tweak preference accessing interface.
- Add UIDevice helper functions.
- Add GlobalState singleton ObservableObject which can be subscribed to by all of my tweaks, currently it offers precise device orientation change logic, but more to come.
- Add DualClock API integration.
- Fix issue with reading tweak prefs
Add BUILD_FOR_DISTRIBUTION build flag, fix some compile errors.
